title: Saturn Transit in the 2nd House for Leo Ascendant
summary: Saturn transiting the second house restructures finances, values, and speech for Leo ascendants. This phase emphasizes discipline in earnings and spending, pushing you to build security patiently. Cash flow may feel restricted initially, but responsible planning creates lasting stability. Communication becomes measured and serious, favoring clarity over charm. When effort aligns with integrity, this transit strengthens self-worth through sustainable resources and grounded values.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Practical mindset around values and security

closing: This transit teaches the power of patience with resources. By choosing discipline over impulse, you build security that lasts.
